column3: Transport patients to and from medical facilities
column5: Administer health care or medical treatments
column7: Respond to emergencies to provide assistance
column9: Evaluate patient functioning, capabilities or health

column13: Maintain inventory of medical supplies or equipment

column23: Examine patients to assess general physical condition

column31: Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments

column41: Administer blood or other fluids intravenously
